summary: Adds A PlayAble Afflicted race to skyrim
descriptionHtml:
-Afflicted Race by Ronsan123-
 
~ Hi guys this is my first mod is Afflicted race,
 I created this because i liked the lore of this race and its abilities :)
 So Helpful comments are welcome :$

 Description of the afflicted race
 
 Skill bonus of afflicted race is :

destruction = 10
illusion = 5
Restoration = 5
One-handed = 5
Light Armor = 5
Alteration = 5

Spells And Abilities

Vile Vapors - Sprays poison on your enemies dealing 20 damage
Poison Resistance - Afflicted blood grants a 25% resistance to Poison
Resist Disease - Resist disease by 50%

 As you may notice my English speaking is bad because English is not really my real Language XD 

~Well hope you enjoyed my mod and have fun :)
author: Ronsan123
